CustomField.description: AD-851 to understand the overall contract risk rating
CustomField.formula: Contract_End_Risk_Score__c + Financial_Risk_Score__c + HS_Risk_Score__c + Operational_Risk_Score__c + People_Risk_Score__c + Relationship_Risk_Score__c + Tender_Risk_Score__c + Delivery_Against_Tender_Risk_Score__c
CustomField.label: Total Contract Risk
